title.narrative: Core contribution to the Association for the Prevention of Torture (APT) 2021

description.narrative: APT is an independent international NGO aiming at preventing the use of torture globally. The organization focuses on torture prevention rather than on individual cases and public condemnation of particular states. This enables the organisation to collaborate with a wide range of relevant actors, inter alia state authorities, police services, the judiciary, national institutions and academics. The Danish grant is a core contribution to support torture prevention activities under the APT's new Strategic Plan 2020-2023. The main focus is on several integrated objectives: promotion of monitoring of places of detention, advocacy for legal and policy frameworks to prevent torture, facilitation of interaction and capacity strengthening to allow more National Preventative Mechanisms, NHRIs, NGOs, judiciary and governmental officials to promote torture prevention.
